actions.whatFrax: What are fraxions?

messages.connectFP: Login to a Fraxion account to unlock this article
messages.editLock: Please Connect to Fraxion to edit lock details
messages.whatFrax: Your Fraxion account will have Fraxions stored in it. They cost around 1 US cent each and can be used at any web site that supports the Fraxion  system.
messages.error:
An unexpected condition has occurred.
Please try refreshing this page in a few minutes.

{error}
messages.noComm: Cannot communicate with the Fraxion Server!!!
messages.noServ:
The Fraxion system is temporarily unavailable.
Please try refreshing this page in a few minutes.
messages.artNoSite:
This article is locked but this site has not yet been registered with Fraxion.
Please try refreshing this page in a few minutes.
messages.artNotReg:
This article is locked but has not yet been registered with Fraxion by the site administrator.
Please try refreshing this page in a few minutes.
